The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 03 October is 409,534 (727.6 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 29 September, there were 38,089 new confirmed cases (67.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 22 September, there were 30,735 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 24% (7354 extra cases).
